```{r}
# Crear el gráfico base con ggplot2
ggplot_base <- df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = variable1, color = "Variable 1"), size = 1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = variable2 / 5, color = "Variable 2"), size = 1) +  # Escalar variable2
  scale_y_continuous(
    name = "Variable 1",
    sec.axis = sec_axis(~ . * 5, name = "Variable 2")  # Ajustar la escala del segundo eje
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(
    name = "Variables",
    values = c("Variable 1" = "blue", "Variable 2" = "red")
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Value") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

# Convertir a plotly
plotly_graph <- ggplotly(ggplot_base)

# Mostrar el gráfico
plotly_graph

```
